title: Heart PCB Soldering Workshop
description: Looking for a way to add some spark to your Valentine’s Day? Join Power Electronics Society & Power and Energy Society for a special Valentine’s event where we’ll be soldering heart-shaped PCBs and lighting them up with LEDs!

title: Soldering Challenge
description: Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, this is a great chance to test your skills, work with circuits, and spark your creativity. Get ready to heat up the competition and learn something new!
